tool.name: grep
tool.description:
Search for content in files using regular expressions. Uses ripgrep if available, otherwise falls back to Python's re module.
Features: - Regex pattern matching - File type filtering with include parameter - Automatic binary file skipping - Results sorted by modification time (newest first) - Maximum 100 matches returned
Examples: - pattern: "def\s+main" - Find function definitions named main - pattern: "TODO|FIXME" - Find TODO or FIXME comments - include: "*.py" - Only search Python files

parameters.parameter: The regex pattern to search for in file contents. Uses Python regex syntax.
The directory to search in. Defaults to project root.
File pattern to include in the search (e.g., "*.py", "*.{ts,tsx}").
